Name: Average resolution time following 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average duration from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Longest duration from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to any completion activity
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Shortest time to resolve an incident after 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average duration from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call' compared to 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Total time incidents spend in 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' state
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average time incidents are reopened after 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and the end of case where activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer occurs

Name: Duration from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call' in the most frequent process variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to the next activity for incidents resolved within 24 hours
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of incidents starting with 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and ending with 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Minimum time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Accepted + In Progress' across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Median duration from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Time variance for 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' across different countries
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and the end of case grouped by the last value of organization country

Name: Time difference between first 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and last 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in a case
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'

Name: Median time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Resolved' for incidents involving 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'
